tool_description: Analyzes potential market impact of large trades on asset prices and provides impact estimates.

trade_size.description: Size of the trade in shares or units

error_messages: Invalid asset symbol: Asset symbol not found or not tradeable.
Invalid trade size: Trade size must be positive.
Invalid volume data: Average daily volume must be positive.
Invalid volatility: Volatility must be non-negative.
Invalid timeframe: Execution timeframe must be positive integer.
usage: Provide asset_symbol, trade_size, avg_daily_volume, and volatility. Adjust execution_timeframe to model different execution speeds.

participation_rate.description: Trade size as percentage of daily volume
